attributes.action: The public demand that Parliament reject the Infrastructure Bill.
attributes.background:
The Infrastructure Bill allows ALL public land to be privatised.  
To includes woods  communally owned parks, rivers, beaches, moors, mountains and fields 
The government is selling off the Land Registry to private, profit making interests. Schedule 3 of this Bill.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/125804
